content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_fc_live
GO
CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_fc_live
AS
    SELECT
    dev.filepath(1) as device,
    dev.filepath(2) as year,
    dev.filepath(3) as month,
    dev.filepath(4) as day,
    dev.[timestamp],
    dev.ID as hexcode,
    dev.LampStatus,
    dev.SPN,
    dev.FMI,
    enginenumber = cast(dev.SA as int)

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK '/textdata/fc_live/Device=*/year=*/month=*/day=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'oxemarine_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )
    WITH (
        timestamp datetime2(0) 1,
        ID varchar(20),
        LampStatus int,
        SPN int,
        FMI int,
        SA  float

    ) AS [dev]
GO

select * from bronze.vw_fc_live
where device = '4CC52878'
            AND year   = '2023'
            AND month  = '03'
            AND day    = '14'
